issue.title: Build SplitSync Expense App v2
issue.body:
# SplitSync Expense Sharing Application

Build a complete expense sharing application called SplitSync.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Drizzle ORM
- PostgreSQL (use pg driver)
- Socket.io for real-time updates
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui components

## Core Features

### 1. User Management
- User registration with email/password
- User profiles with name, email, avatar
- Session management

### 2. Group Management
- Create groups with name and description
- Add/remove members from groups
- Group member roles (admin, member)

### 3. Expense Tracking
- Add expenses to a group
- Split expenses equally or custom amounts
- Expense categories (food, rent, utilities, entertainment, other)
- Expense descriptions and notes
- Upload receipt images (optional)

### 4. Balance Calculation
- Calculate who owes whom
- Simplify debts (minimum number of transactions)
- Real-time balance updates via Socket.io
- User balance history

### 5. Settlements
- Record payments between users
- Mark settlements as complete
- Settlement history

## Database Schema

Tables needed:
- users (id, email, password_hash, name, avatar_url, created_at)
- groups (id, name, description, created_by, created_at)
- group_members (id, group_id, user_id, role, joined_at)
- expenses (id, group_id, payer_id, amount, description, category, created_at)
- expense_splits (id, expense_id, user_id, amount, share_type)
- settlements (id, group_id, from_user_id, to_user_id, amount, status, created_at)

## UI Pages

- Home/Dashboard: Show user's groups and overall balance
- Group Detail: Show group expenses, balances, settlements
- Add Expense: Form to add new expense
- Settlement: Show who owes whom and record settlements
- Profile: User profile settings

## Requirements

1. All pages should be responsive and use Tailwind CSS
2. Use shadcn/ui components where applicable
3. Real-time updates for expenses and settlements
4. Proper error handling and validation
5. Clean, modern UI design

Please build this application completely with all features working.
